message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase our product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $15,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is beyond my budget. I'm very interested in this product, but I can only go up to $9,000 right now.  Let me know if that's a starting point for us.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9,000 is a bit low for me, but I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $12,500. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you think?
Alice, I'm still interested in this product, but $12,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500.  Let's see if we can meet in the middle here.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $13,000. I'm willing to make a small concession, so I'm counteroffering at $12,750. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you think?

Alice,  I understand your perspective, but $12,750 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground here.  I'm eager to get this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad you're still interested in the product. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'm counteroffering at $12,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. I'm getting close to my minimum, so I hope we can meet here.
